title: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa - Wikipedia
snippet: On 1 December 2025, Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa was admitted to University Hospital of São João, in Porto, for urgent surgery due to an incarcerated hernia, after feeling unwell.

title: Portuguese President Rebelo de Sousa hospitalised following emergency surgery | Euronews
snippet: The Portuguese head of state was admitted to hospital late on Monday afternoon "after feeling unwell following digestive issues," but is said to be recovering following an emergency hernia operation.

title: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa valida OE2026 e valoriza contributo parlamentar
snippet: O Presidente da República promulgou esta segunda-feira, dia 22 de dezembro de 2025 o Orçamento do Estado para 2026 (OE2026), salientando a contribuição do parlamento “para a estabilidade financeira interna e externa” e considerando que ...

title: Marcelo vetoes decrees of the nationality law due to unconstitutionality. Sul Informação
snippet: The two decrees now had to be vetoed on grounds of unconstitutionality by the President of the Republic, Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, who, in response to requests from the Socialist Party, decided not to submit any provisions of these decrees to ...

title: President of Portugal - Wikipedia
snippet: The current president of Portugal is Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, who took office on 9 March 2016.
